content:
sunday ah a day
we watched girls und panzers das finale 3 and 4 and ngl the finale 4 was one of the better animated anime movies i saw the action is just crazy
and cuz of that we palyed foxhole 8 of us! it was blast but then we lost one out of four tanks cuz peeps left and after that we died cuz we got caough in a pickle and got surrunded losing anoter tank, after that we just kinda gave up dropped the tanks went to eat cuz most of us havent and watched transformers and omg the movie sucks ass, product placment with pentagon propaganda... fuck yea i love the military... and worth mention weird amount of cockholdery... like wtf... *can i at least watch*...LIKE DAWG WTFFF ARE YOU ON????
i opened up to vlad and alex about the situation... they said i fucked up by dropping a truth nuke... and for them it looks like it affects me more... telling me to choose if im willing to stick or i should just cut it... AND i should talk to my supersoilders (god i love alex my man) but one of my supersoilders is very mad at me for ignoring his advice and i really dont wanna bother the other in case i make the same mistake... i really wanna stay
